snippet: The world’s newest country seems to be exploding in violence.
abstract: South Sudan, the world’s newest country, seems to be exploding in violence; more than 1,000 people have been killed in the past several months in clashes between rival ethnic groups.
lead_paragraph: The world’s newest country seems to be exploding in violence.

headline.seo: South Sudan Raid Shows Rivals’ Escalating Clashes
headline.main: Raid on Rivals in South Sudan Shows Escalating Violence
headline.print_headline: Raid on Rivals in South Sudan Shows Escalating Violence in World’s Newest Nation

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
